\renewcommand*\maketitle[1][1]{%
  \if@titlepage
    \begin{titlepage}
    \ifcsstring{cl_tp_type}{flag}%
        {\newgeometry{top=7.5mm, bottom=10mm, inner=43.5mm, outer=16.5mm}}%
        {\newgeometry{top=10mm, bottom=10mm, inner=34.8mm, outer=16.5mm}}%
    \setcounter{page}{#1}%
	\csuse{cl_tp_head}{Kanton Z端rich\\\csuse{cl_tp_headtext}}
	\csuse{cl_tp_title}
	\csuse{cl_tp_subtitle}
	\ifcsempty{cl_tp_comment}%
		{}{\par\bigskip\begin{zhbox}\raggedright\hyphenrules{nohyphenation}\usekomafont{date}\csuse{cl_tp_comment}\end{zhbox}}%
	\iftoggle{cl_tp_impressum}{}%
		{\par\bigskip\usekomafont{author}\@author}%
	\iftoggle{cl_tp_date}%
		{\par\bigskip{\usekomafont{date}\@date}}{}%
	\restoregeometry
	\iftoggle{cl_tp_impressum}%
	{	\newpage
		\thispagestyle{empty}
		\subsection*{Impressum}
		\subsubsection*{Herausgeberin} \@publishers%
		\ifx\@author\@empty \else%
			\subsubsection*{Redaktion}%
			\@author%
			\ifcsempty{cl_tp_imp_author_appendix}%
				{}{\par \csuse{cl_tp_imp_author_appendix}}%
		\fi
		\ifcsempty{cl_tp_imp_addition}%
			{}{\csuse{cl_tp_imp_addition}}%
		\iftoggle{cl_tp_imp_address}%
			{\subsubsection*{Bezugsadresse} Bildungsdirektion Kanton Z端rich, Bildungsplanung\newline%
				Walcheplatz 2, 8090 Z端rich\par %
				\csuse{cl_tp_imp_email}\newline %
				\csuse{cl_tp_imp_url}}{}%
		\ifcsempty{cl_tp_imp_citation}%
			{}{\subsubsection*{Empfohlene Zitation}\csuse{cl_tp_imp_citation}}
		\iftoggle{cl_tp_imp_copyright}%
			{\subsubsection*{Copyright} %
				Bildungsdirektion Kanton Z端rich, %
				\csuse{cl_tp_imp_copyright_date}}{}%
		\ifcsempty{cl_tp_imp_foot}%
			{}{\par\vspace*{\fill}\usekomafont{small} \csuse{cl_tp_imp_foot}}%
	}{}%
	\end{titlepage}
  \fi
  }
